[![Scala Steward badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Scala_Steward-helping-blue.svg?style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://scala-steward.org)
# Personal Scala Steward
Periodically runs [Scala Steward](https://github.com/scala-steward-org/scala-steward) on my repos

* [scala-steward](https://github.com/scala-steward-org/scala-steward) - Info on Scala Steward
* [scala-steward-github-action](https://github.com/marketplace/actions/scala-steward-github-action) - How to create a Github action to run Scala Steward
